pr_title: Mention how CCR can help optimize indexing throughput.

timeline.message: Mention how CCR can help optimize indexing throughput.

timeline.bodyText: The data needs to be replicated to the follower cluster as well, so I'm not sure if the phrasing here (optimize indexing throughput) makes it clear what the actual benefit is (namely to better handle (search) load spikes, so that they don't interfere with indexing).
timeline.author: ywelsch
